Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Board class Contains 1050x750? frame from which 750x750 should go for 2d Square array called map Board also has JButton btclicked to store currently clicked button Current level is stored in integer array called level At the top of frame there are giveUp clickable button if player don't know how to beat level so want to come back to menu and tryAgain clickable button if player want to try completing same level again

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int[] input)
      Board constructor This method returns frame containing giveUp and tryAgain buttons at the top and 5x5 Square map in the center Current level is loaded from input

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      if anything is clicked check which button was clicked if btclicked holds Square with frog check if it can go to currently clicked Square i.e.
      void endGame()
      endGame method after each click it check if there is redFrog if not print message to terminal and start level again if there is red frog checks if there is no greenFrog if yes then print message to terminal and open new Menu class if there is at least 1 greenFrog - do nothing

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int[] input)
        Board constructor This method returns frame containing giveUp and tryAgain buttons at the top and 5x5 Square map in the center Current level is loaded from input
        Parameters:
        input - containing level to load

    • Method Detail

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        endGame method after each click it check if there is redFrog if not print message to terminal and start level again if there is red frog checks if there is no greenFrog if yes then print message to terminal and open new Menu class if there is at least 1 greenFrog - do nothing

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        if anything is clicked check which button was clicked if btclicked holds Square with frog check if it can go to currently clicked Square i.e. checks if jump will be performed over another frog if move is valid perform it and delete frog over which jump was performed else if no Square was selected select the one clicked if some Square was selected and move is not valid unselect it after move chceck if the level is done if tryAgain button was clicked - load same level again if giveUp button was clicked - load new menu
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
